title: 115_s2611
content: The curr_chunk states the repeal of the Environmental Quality Incentives Program. The curr_chunk repeals Chapter 4 of subtitle D of title XII of the Food Security Act of 1985 and makes conforming amendments to sections 1211(a)(3) and 1221(b)(3) of the Act. The curr_chunk involves amendments to various sections of the Food Security Act of 1985, including striking certain provisions and subsections. The curr_chunk involves amendments to subsections (a)(5), (h), and (i) of the Food Security Act of 1985, including changes to wording and the removal of certain paragraphs. Amendments are made to Section 1244 and Section 1271A(1) of the Food Security Act of 1985, including the redesignation of paragraphs and removal of certain sections. Amendments are made to various sections of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, including the redesignation of subparagraphs and removal of certain provisions. Amendments are made to various sections of the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, including the redesignation of subparagraphs and removal of certain provisions related to the conservation reserve program, Soil Conservation and Domestic Allotment Act, and the Food, Agriculture, Conservation, and Trade Act of 1990. Amendments are made to Section 304 of the Lake Champlain Special Designation Act of 1990, including the redesignation of subsections and removal of certain provisions. Amendment to Section 202 of the Colorado River Basin Salinity Control Act involves striking subsection (c).
